modName: Ebony chestplate replacement for nightingale torso
summary: Replace the nightingale torso with the ebony chestplate without changing any stats.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod will replace the nightingale torso with the ebony chest plate. All the stats and enchantments from the nightingale torso will remain the same. 

Installation:
Drop \"meshes\" into the Data folder in your game directory, usually located at:
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim
or
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim
author: ErL1510
